evidence: Earlier PET scanners used planar imaging mode
mechanical collimators defining the imaging planes
shape the radioactivity that could reach the detectors
detect gamma photons from many directions
These collimators would shape the radioactivity that could reach the detectors, so the ring only collected signals from a thin slice, or plane, of the patient.
triples.o: separating detector ring & defining imaging planes

concepts.term: not limited by a physical collimator
not limited by a physical collimator
